zh-CN.desc: 宣布基于 Apache APISIX 的服务网格项目正式开源
支流科技进入中国信通院发布的首批开源供应商名录
宣布获得顺为数百万美元 A 轮领投、真格基金跟投
宣布完成真成投资百万美元 Pre-A 轮融资
宣布完成真格基金百万美元天使轮融资
Apache APISIX Ingress Controller 进入 Apache 基金会
Apache APISIX 荣获 OSCAR 尖峰开源项目和社区
Apache APISIX 通过信通院“可信开源项目”权威认证
Apache APISIX 推出插件编排功能，这是全球第一家开源的低代码 API 网关
商业产品 APISEVEN 通过华为鲲鹏兼容性认证
Apache APISIX 成为中国最快毕业的 Apache 顶级项目
APISIX 进入 Apache 孵化器，这是中国第一个由创业公司捐赠的项目
第一家客户在生产环境上线
APISIX 进入 CNCF 全景图

en-US.desc: APISEVEN open sourced the Service Mesh project based on Apache APISIX
APISEVEN is one of the Open Source suppliers verified by CAICT
APISEVEN raises millions in Series A Funding led by Shunwei Capital
APISEVEN raises millions in Series Pre-A Funding led by Zhencheng Capital
APISEVEN raises millions in Series Angel Funding led by ZhenFund
Apache APISIX Ingress Controller enters the Apache Foundation
Apache APISIX Awarded OSCAR Pinnacle Open Source Project and Community
Apache APISIX passed the authoritative certification of ”Trusted Open Source Project“ of CAICT Academy
Apache APISIX Introduces Plugin Orchestration, the World's First Open Source Low-Code API Gateway
Commercial Product APISEVEN Passes Huawei Kunpeng Compatibility Certification
Apache APISIX becomes the fastest graduating Apache top project in China
APISIX enters Apache Incubator, the first program in China to be donated by a startup
First customer goes live in the production environment
APISIX is open source on GitHub
